amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enforce section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act which prohibits federal agencies from purchasing synthetic fuels unless the fuels emit the same or fewer greenhouse gas emissions as petroleum.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enforce section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
